original_text: So Joram slept with his fathers and was buried with his fathers in the city of David, and Ahaziah his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 여호람이 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 조상들과 함께 다윗 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 아하시야가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: So Joram slept with his fathers
and was buried with his fathers in the city of David
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 성에 그의 조상들과 함께 장사되었으며

sentences.original_text: and Ahaziah his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아하시야가 그의 자리를 대신하여 다스렸다.
